author: Special Correspondent
text:
The three leopard cubs that were initially abandoned by its mother in an estate area near Pandalur in The Nilgiris on Thursday.

Residents of Pandalur near Gudalur in The Nilgiris had exciting moments on Thursday, when they spotted four leopard cubs near TANTEA estates.

Even as the public watched the cubs from a distance, fearing the presence of the mother in the vicinity, the leopardess suddenly made an appearance and took away one of the cubs, leaving the three behind.

But, within a few hours , the leopardess was said to have taken away all the three cubs.
title: Leopardess reclaims abandoned cubs
